name: line-bot-webhook
description: LINE Bot Webhook Server for Cloudflare Workers

scripts.setup-secrets: echo 'Run these commands to set up secrets:' && echo 'wrangler secret put LINE_CHANNEL_SECRET' && echo 'wrangler secret put LINE_CHANNEL_ACCESS_TOKEN' && echo 'wrangler secret put GOOGLE_SHEETS_API_KEY' && echo 'wrangler secret put GOOGLE_SHEETS_SPREADSHEET_ID'
